title: Tokyo Fantasia
synopsis: A musical animated film by G9+1, a group of veteran animators. It won the Tokyo Anime Award in 2010.
staff: [['Furukawa, Taku', ['Animation Director']], ['Suzuki, Shinichi', ['Animation Director']], ['Nishimura, Hiroshi', ['Animation Director']], ['Hikone, Norio', ['Animation Director']]]
